data.name: Red-Eyes Burn
data.desc: If a face-up "Red-Eyes" monster(s) you control, except "Red-Eyes B. Chick", is destroyed by battle or card effect: Target 1 of those monsters; both players take damage equal to its original ATK. You can only activate 1 "Red-Eyes Burn" per turn.

card_sets.set_name: Dragons of Legend: The Complete Series
